column4: Hi, this is my setup, http://i39.tinypic.com/b4f4a9.jpg I cannot boot to Ubuntu, please help in reisntalling grub
What happens when you boot?
I was using the vista bootloader to boot but it somehow messed up and doesnt let me boot in now
ah, if you still want to use the vista bcd bootloader I would recommend using EasyBCD from within vista to configure, otherwise install grub.
I did try with easybcd it wont let me boot into ubuntu still after removing and readding ubuntu
That's bothersome... I dodn't know how to fix it through BCD then... does it give any messages when trying to boot into ubuntu?
it gets stuck on Loading partiton image, and it says something about bootpart
I think you might have lost the grub mbr on the partition, did you change the partition to which grub has written it's mbr recently?
I did few weeks ago, but it was fine till I shutdown yesterday havent touched any partition for weeks
hum, odd...
usr13 raylu Can I delete my xp and vista partitions and free up space will that help? I actually need files from the FAT32
Probably not with the boot issue... by the way how did you setup easybcd in the first place?
xp and vista were auto added, and Ubuntu using the Linux tab
how did you install ubuntu, with grub bootaloder etc.?
installed vista first, then xp, then ubuntu, and installed grub to sda6 only I think
you might want to try root (hd0,5) instead, if you still want to try to get bcd up.
what do you mean?
when using the commands you put in pastebin, that should install grub to mbr on sda6... I think
That is your output? In that case it looks it might work...
th0r: not within grub i don't think
Now I think you could try configuring BCD again...
exactemundo :)
